rules_text:
Creatures you control that became creatures, or became equipped, this turn have double strike. [i](Equipped creatures can't become equipped.)[/i]
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Equipped creature has base power 4.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one –
• Ixi becomes a 4/2 Spirit creature.
• Ixi becomes an Equipment artifact. Attach it to target creature.
